text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall I'll believe it when I see it at the door step of the needful. Lots of people talking. Many say trump is a mob boss. Could that be true? Some say so many dead from his limp and flaccid COVID19 response. Sad that Trump is such a loser based on ratings. So many alternate facts.
